main.java.circleBoard

Class CircleBoard

  • Object
    • CircleBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChessboard

    public class CircleBoard
extends Object
implements IChessboard
    Class to represent a Circle Chessboard from 24x6 Squares for a three player Chess game.

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare(int x,
                        int y)
        Get the reference to the square for the given x and y integers after click Use transformation of x and y to polar coordinates to obtain the x and y index of the Square. The angle is calculated based on the corresponding quadrant
        Specified by:
        getSquare in interface IChessboard
        Parameters:
        x - x position on the window
        y - y position on the window
        Returns:
        reference to searched square

      • move

        public void move(Square begin,
                 Square end)
        Move piece from a square to a different one If the piece is a pawn checks if it has passed the center so that the regular move is changed from forward to backward in the y axis.
        Specified by:
        move in interface IChessboard
        Parameters:
        begin - square from which move piece
        end - square where we want to move piece
